MapGenerator.MainStructure

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • MapGenerator.MainStructure.Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    Room consists of multiple fields. Each room object has it level. Room is able to move in map's grid and change its level in room's hierarchy
    Author:
    Lukas Jelinek

      • Room

        public Room(Map m,
            java.util.Random rand,
            int roomID,
            int x,
            int y,
            int level,
            int width,
            int height)
        Parameters:
        m - reference to map
        rand - random generator object
        roomID - ID of this room
        x - left top corner of room fields
        y - left top corner of rooms field
        level - initial level in room's hierarchy
        width - width of the room
        height - height of the room

      • lower
